definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Be sure to review the Information about the collection of the zebra mussel data.
sentences.chinese: 要保证熟读有关收集斑马贻贝数据的说明。

sentences.english: The Zebrafish DVD Exchange Project is aimed at by-passing these limitations.
sentences.chinese: 斑马鱼DVD交换计划旨在绕过这些限制。

sentences.english: So I am thinking about it, " the Bianconeri hero concluded cryptically."
sentences.chinese: 斑马军团的英雄的回答很模糊。

sentences.english: He has what it takes to wear the Bianconeri shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他有能力穿上斑马军团的黑白剑条衫。

sentences.english: The zebra pattern chairs which brings up the uniqueness and effort of the designer.
sentences.chinese: 斑马条纹的高背椅带出设计者的用心及创意。

sentences.english: The quagga was a strikingly beautiful variant of the zebra.
sentences.chinese: 斑驴是一种极美丽的斑马变种。

sentences.english: The zebra galloped away from the lion.
sentences.chinese: 斑马疾驰飞奔远离狮子。

sentences.english: Hello, little zebra, what kind of delicious foods do you take?
sentences.chinese: 小斑马，你带什么好吃的了？

sentences.english: Lion on a zebra kill, by Alistair Swartz.
sentences.chinese: 狮子杀食斑马，由阿利斯泰尔斯沃茨。

sentences.english: In this experiment, zebrafish are exposed to a dye that highlights living hair cells.
sentences.chinese: 在他们的实验中，斑马鱼身上活的毛细胞被染色。

sentences.english: The Quagga was a southern subspecies of the Plains Zebra.
sentences.chinese: 斑驴是南非草原斑马的一个亚种。

sentences.english: Thirsty zebras gather at water holes, circling them like necklaces of white-and-black beads.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的斑马聚集在水坑处，如黑白相间的项珠环绕着。

sentences.english: Zebra sees a lion, stress makes her run.
sentences.chinese: 斑马看见一头狮子，压力迫使它逃跑。

sentences.english: It had begun as an electrical fire in the Zebra Room, adjacent to the bride's dressing room.
sentences.chinese: 火灾是从新娘化妆室旁“斑马屋”的电火花开始的。

sentences.english: Cars have to yield to pedestrians at zebra crossings.
sentences.chinese: 汽车须在斑马线前停下来让路予行人。
